ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Treatment_Assistance_Program", NOT(ISBLANK( Routing_Number__c )), LEN(Routing_Number__c) <> 9, !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "application__c" )
